product_name: Green Guru Dash Recycled Bike Tube Handlebar Bag
long_description: Made from recycled bike tubes, this Green Guru Dash Handlebar bag stashes necessities for your ride. A transparent pocket keeps your phone, GPS or map within view for on-the-go navigation. Fabric of bag is made of a blend of recycled bike tubes, recycled clear vinyl and recycled PET (plastic soda bottles). Water-resistant rubber exterior fends off light showers. Easy access pocket features zippered closure to securely stow your lunch, shades and sunscreen. Outer window pocket features rip-and-stick closure to secure a map or GPS. Rip-and-stick straps mount the Green Guru Dash bag on your handlebar without hassle.
short_description: Made from recycled bike tubes, this Green Guru Dash Handlebar bag stashes necessities for your ride. A transparent pocket keeps your phone, GPS or map within view for on-the-go navigation.
